title: A Real, Indepth Analysis Provided With Statistics About Why A Champ Is Broken  (Long Read)
body:
{{champion:157}}  Nerf this cancer spreading, aneurysm giving, hog wash piece of s**t riot.

Thank you for reading.

replies.body: https://media.makeameme.org/created/its-funny-because-mjy4hz.jpg
I dunno if we should laugh or cry. T_T :DD
Family Guy reference? Definitely cry.
Why not both?

Why is this in M&G?

It's a higher quality post than half of what comes from gameplay.

People don't read long, thought out posts in gameplay. M&G I find to be a bit more lenient and take the time to skim through all the data that's provided. The minute some one sees a wall of text, they instantly run away in gameplay. :c
I'll usually skim. Then again, most of my reading time on the Boards is M&G, so...

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBot666,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MpFqt9OZ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-04-13T00:32:36.702+0000)
>
> Why is this in M&G?
> 
> It's a higher quality post than half of what comes from gameplay.

Why would you answer your own question like that? Now we have nothing else to talk about! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

@Riot: Don't worry guys, I got this!
_______________________
#PBE
___________________

#Zeal
_Total cost lowered from 1300 to 1200. _

__________________

#Infinity Edge
_Total cost lowered from 3600 to 3400_
_____________

#[REWORKED] Guardian Angel
_Total Cost: 2400g_
_Build Path: Pickaxe + Long Sword + Cloth Armor + 875g_
_+40 Attack Damage_
_+30 Armor_
_Unique Passive: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% of base Health and 30% of maximum Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).
_
_______________

#Randuin's Omen
_Crit reduction [REMOVED]_

___________

Updated Today on PBE
http://i.imgur.com/Sxam4jT.png?noredirect

Yesterday it had crit reduction and it built out of Thornmail.
http://i.imgur.com/NFzVtG7.png?noredirect
I would fucking buy that version of Randuin's any day.

It is pretty shagadelic, isn't it?
It would make ADCs even worse, and screw over Yasuo. What's not to love?
Yes, finally! Someone GETS it!
http://68.media.tumblr.com/42638fc7f1229d5be7dac0760c32481c/tumblr_mwzszinQc61rzik3go1_400.gif
Ok, now make your defense on Zeal cost reduction + IE cost reduction + AD-GA rework

I didn't read any of them. I don't know what any of the changes are, and I don't care. I just skimmed past your comment, but noticed the bit about Randiun's at the last second. I only knew about Randuin's because I heard from someone else that they added Thornmail to it.

I typically don't bother with paying attention to things that are so tentative. Not a single item change is guaranteed. Complaining about it is pointless until they hit the live server.

Complaining about when it hit the live server is also pointless since Riot never revert a change.. So we can't complain in the Beta test part, where they can revert, but we should complain when hit the live server where they never revert.. 

You're some kind of new breed of genius.

It's called, "typing when you're aggravated". I most certainly would not recommend it. Side effects include being disgusted in oneself for the stupid crap said.

All I initially wanted was to show you that Crit reduction was put back onto Randuin's, then leave this and never come back to it. I'm not trying to defend Riot, or anything they do. I'm no balance guru.

Riot is in the experimental phase right now, so the changes shouldn't be taken too seriously. Obviously, every change at every point should be scrutinized to a degree. If you have a problem with something Riot does, voice it. 

I wasn't thinking about what I was saying before, I have no excuse.
But you didn't have to be so mean about it.
It's starting to look like its old self again.
Hopefully they go back a day, I like the idea of it building out of Thornmail.
Wait, it has less health and slightly more armor now? Idk, I thought the thornmail idea was a good change.
Say what you want about me, whether it's a joke or not, never bring people's parents into this. Just gonna report your comment. This is M&G. Take it easy there buddy.

Funny because it's a joke. Funnier still because you took it seriously.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Even more funny because he is silver himself and insulting other silvers.

I bet he deserves Challenger though!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Bruh, you can't even  type, maybe you should learn ENGLISH from the koreans
You're silver and you main yasuo. Smh o.o

Pretty much every complain.

Yasuo WIND WALL can BLOCK ALL THE DAMAGE, HIS UNTOUCHABLE.
Yasuo has the best shield in the game. (Perishes with a spit)
(Also does no damage to tanks despite what everyone was thinking he does.)

50% bonus armor pen on top of his build of 100% crit chance and usually life steal enables him to damage and duel tanks.  Yeah, it's somewhat loaded behind his ult, but its the largest fuck you to armor any champion in the game has, and he can stack it with items too if he wants to make armor almost nonexistent.
Do you actively play tanks?

**That** is somewhat threatening to a tank (would be a lot more if he had a legit build).

Yasuo... Is a minor inconvenience. As much Armor Penetration everyone says he eats tanks with, he doesn't last long en to use it.
I think what Mallecke meant to say is that If someone plays Darius with the build and then complains that Yasuo easily dueled them, that's the problem, that they weren't really a tank.

I think he was more implying the stereotypical view of a "tank" presented by people who never play tank (A juggernaut with a cruddy build, seriously, who grabs Cleaver _and_ Hydra for **Darius**?) Followed by a kappa.

I was originally talking to some guy who was falsely convinced that Yasuo can 100-0 a full build tank.

What's funny is that the guy got camped as hell, had a poor score and somehow one shotted my adc with q r q (e as well i think). Like seriously ... that's just old tankko with hella more mobility, and (not really) squishier.

> [{quoted}](name=le un le seul,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MpFqt9OZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-12T21:28:15.642+0000)
>
> _ one shotted 
killed my adc with q r q (e as well i think). _

Pick one.

One-shot is generally used when champion kills someone else quickly with small amount or no counterplay (or more accurately said, window of opportunity to react) even If they use multiple abilities. Barely any champion would be able to actually one-shot anyone. Maybe something with ratios like Xerath on his wavekiller when extremly fed and used against enemy champ that was afk most of game.

Yes, people do abuse the term, so I understand other people's attachment to literal meaning of the phrase, however I think it's easy to understand he meant that Yasuo was strongly behind and still needed to hit single skill-shot (which also can be hit guaranteedly with E) to give very little chance for the ADC to do something. And even If that Yasuo got killed immediately afterwards by people who were around the desperate ADC, it might still feel unfair to them.

> [{quoted}](name=dragovich5d,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MpFqt9OZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-13T03:21:39.413+0000)
>
> killed my adc with q r q (e as well i think). _
> 
> Pick one.

Pick one? Does zed one shots with his R only?
One shots are usually a combo of abilities that you blow on the same target in 1-2 seconds.
Meh, probably just play too many shooter games.(cough cod cough)
TL;DR
Not available. You have to read everything to understand my point of view. It's only a bit long, you should be able to take 5minutes out of your time to finish it.
For this comment I just downvoted you.
Then I'm sorry to say, you just lost the memes war!
This war might be lost, but the battle is not over!
